o--- Lokk / Axis / Lynxiz ---o

The missile his the ground behind Lokk, and he is thrown, into a 
clump of trees. Bullets whiz into the trees around him. He frowns 
thinking to himself, <<Seekker? Proabably>> and he waits lying on 
the ground out of view. He starts to crawl along, away from the 
Chivitron base, trying to get behind the enemy.

The laser beams hit the pod Axis is hiding behind and disipate. He 
quickly brings his weapon over the pod, and fires a laser at 
Barrymore. He then arcs a missile over the pod at Barrymore's last 
location. He is pelted by bullets and gapes at Seekker, "What are 
you doing!?! Get them, not me!" He keeps hiding, not wanting to be 
hurt. He never known for his courage.

Lynxiz slips three more disks into her launcher, looking for a new 
target. Spotting another enemy who was attacking Termitron, she 
sets up her disk launcher, and fires three disk at Stranato.


On 7 Jul 2001, at 17:37, Jordan Guthrie wrote:

> Seekker ran out of the chivtron base his miniguns firing like crazy.
> Noy aiming at any particualarly ten shot went at Mcgowan and the other
> 14 split going at Lokk and Axis.
